sentences.sContent: Or God will toss off a limerick for your pleasure.
sentences.sContent_eng: Or God will toss off a limerick for your pleasure.
sentences.sCn: 或者上帝为了使你高兴而抛出一首五行打油诗。

sentences.sContent: Of course the poetry form called limerick takes its name from the Irish city called Limerick.
sentences.sContent_eng: Of course the poetry form called limerick takes its name from the Irish city called Limerick.
sentences.sCn: 这种叫做五行打油诗的诗歌的名字“limerick”来源于爱尔兰的利默里克郡。

trans.tranCn: 五行打油诗（一种通俗幽默短诗，有五行组成，韵式为aabba）
trans.tranOther: a humorous short poem that has five lines that rhyme
